caption.p: Projected change in premature mortality due to PM 2.5 exposure w.r.t. baseline period over the Indian landmass. Projected percentage changes in premature mortality burden from ambient PM 2.5 exposure in India for the five SSP scenario population using projected baseline mortality under a RCP4.5 and b RCP8.5 scenarios. The range (1–99%) of premature mortality (as a function of standard error in baseline mortality model and the range of PM 2.5 from CMIP5 models) is shown as shades around the mean values as bold lines.
